title: Something to do
text: If you r looking for something to do with the Kids, the aquarium is ok. Long line ups, so get your tickets on line. They have two separate line ups, so you can save some time. I felt a little vertigo when I was in there, but overall cool to see.

title: What a View
text: Fantastic View from 100's of meters in the air. Once the tallest structure in the world, this place will always satisfy. I've never found line ups and the ride in the elevator is an experience in itself. Try out the dinning at the top of the Cn tower. decent food for a decent price considering.

title: Italian food at its best
text:
What a place. I'm still raving about it a year later. They are amazing. A bit of background on how we found it and most families will appreciate it. My son really had to go to the bathroom, but we had been turned away from many places because we hadn't dined there or they didn't have a bathroom for guests.

Well, my wife to the little guy to Locale and they helped out and had no issues assisting us. I immediately made a reservation for dinner and came back the following night. What an experience. The food was more authentic then when I was in Rome. The customer service was amazing.

HIGHLY RECOMMEND IT!!

title: Fantastic Location
text: Right be the London Eye attraction and located near a hop on hop off bus stop. We stayed here last summer and enjoyed every minute of it. Black out curtains to get rid of jet lag, fantastic restaurant and cafe to grab food and perfect drop off and pick up for airport transfers. Highly recommend it.

title: Places to Visit in Athens
text: Well is you dint visit this monument in Athens you are not one step closer to the Gods. It marks not only a wonderful spot in history, but also signifies the amazing engineering that went into building it. Great spot for photos while in Greece. Just DONT go there in the afternoon in the middle of summer. Visit early in the morning or late afternoon.

title: Must See
text: Great place to visit after the acropolis. This area is at the base of the acropolis and has a lot of history. Great restaurants, nightlife and bars to cool down in the Athenian heat.

title: What an experience
text: Love Greek cabbies. They now where their going and where to take you. Some are scammers, but what industry doesn't have bad apples.

title: Crazy Street
text: When you visit this monument, remember not to cross the street on your own and use the tunnels. Very important. Its a great spot for photos and to learn about its history.

title: Watch the pick pockets
text: Fabulous place to visit and have a picnic on the garden in front of the Eiffel Tower. Watch out for the pickpockets. They play a game and have you interact, while their friends pick your pockets. Don't bring valuables in this area and watch the kids. otherwise a must see when in Paris

title: Breath Taking
text:
This street is not only impressive in photos. but it takes your breath away in person. My family and I visited this spot on a number of occasions when we visited Paris.
Greta place for food, drinks and shopping. A must stop if your travelling Paris. Take in the sites and have a glass of wine and relax.

title: Great company
text: They waited for us at the gate. pleasant and knowledgeable driver. He was even there to pick us up at the end of our trip. We even saw the Queen driving back from her stables. Quick, cheap and great service. Highly recommend this service.

title: Great VIEWS
text: Perfect place to see all of London. Coca Cola did it right. The pods are deceiving from pictures. They actually fit upward to 20+ people in them. Line ups are quick and the entire adventure took 45-50 minutes. Kids loved it!

title: Love to live there
text: It be nice to be a royal for the day, but I got as close as I could to the gate. Great spot for the family to walk around and get some needed pics out of the way. Not many restaurants or cafes to stop and grab something near by, but a called for an Uber and it picked me up right at the entrance. Quick in and out visit. Long live the Queen

title: Clean and On Time
text: Easy way to get around. A lot of Police and security so I felt safe with the family. They have a lot of lines, so it could be confusing but people are more than willing to help you find your way.

title: Royal Family
text: This is where the Royals marry. Or at least the ones in line for the thrown. Cool place to visit and you can grab some Royal souvenirs on the way. Security was knowledgeable and very helpful to me and the family. I found Uber'ng it there was cheaper and more efficient than the transit or hop on hop off bus.

title: Great PICS
text: Awesome place for family pictures. You selfie crazed people would love it here. Perfect walk after lunch and a great place to grab a coffee or ice cream off a truck in the area. Must See

title: Cool Place but No kids
text: I had a blast walking around Borough Market last summer. I wouldn't suggest going there with kids. There's homelessness all around and they could be mean and aggressive. Also, people walking around with beers doing pub crawls. If you wanted to visit with friends and or a significant other, its a MUST SEE when in London.

title: Just like Home
text: Not many places are on point with their steaks. This place is a must see when in Athens. I would call in advance and make a reservation before you arrive and are disappointed. I brought my family there for a big dinner and was pleasantly surprised at not only the service, professionalism, but also the way they prepare the food. Its North American Steakhouse at its finest in Europe. Great job everyone at Base Grill perfect spot.

title: A Must in Athens
text: Cool way to see history in Athens. After walking back down from the Acropolis, walk along the old city under your feet and into what I feel is the coolest museum I have ever been in. Staff are friendly and knowledgeable. Best way to cool down after the Acropolis and just before a lunch in Plaka.

title: Ok for a Lunch or Drinks
text: Lohan's restaurant was a cool vibe. Its located near Alimos, Athen on the Athenian Riviera. We had drinks and some apps in August 2019 with the family. Kid friendly and you can also catch sum sun on their beach front. I saw some windsurfing, but didn't try it out. The drinks and food are modestly priced for the area.

title: Amazing!! Bravo!!
text: My families GO TO spot in Athens south coast. Along the Athinian Riviera you will find different towns and there centres. This is located in Voula. Great place for brunch and dinner. On the pricier side, but you get what you pay for. The people, service and food are exceptional. It's a classier area, so I would at least look good before going there. This is where a lot of the sports people in the City live along with politicians.

title: Just like home
text: Why go to something that you can get at home. If you insist, its tastes and cost about the same as it would be at home. When in Rome they say!! try some nice family spots and local places first. If you don't like it then revert back to your frappe, half inch foam, soya milk...... latte. Enjoy what Starbucks has to offer

title: Acropolis by Night
text: So you've walked all over Athens and saw everything you can see, but you haven't seen the acropolis light up at night. Great rooftop to have an early dinner and then stay for drinks. The best spot for family pics (with the waiters help) and or those selfies. Enjoy

title: My Coffee spot
text: These locations are located throughout Athens. be like a local and grab a Fredo or frappe with a cheese pie for breakfast. Very cost effective and will keep you full until lunch or maybe even an early dinner. I've travelled all over Greece and this is my go to place for my coffee throughout the day.

title: O.G of souvlaki and gyros
text: If you find yourself in glorious Athens, please don't forget to visit this spot. Take a break and sit on the patio and enjoy a cold beer with an authentic Gyros. The waiters can be pushy and a bit fast, but overall its an experience that everyone should try. As a tourist, I find that most countries don't have great spots for tourists, seeing that we don't know better. Well NOT in Athens. This is surely going to be a good one for you. Oh ya, look up when your at the Patio and you can see the Acropolis.

title: Soccer Game
text: Always love going to the stadium with my family. This time we decided to enter Thira 7. This is where the Hooligans live. I call them great fans myself. True love of the game. We won so it made my visit extra special. Kids had a blast.

title: Birthday
text: Very nice place. Great location in downtown Toronto. Close too bars and clubs. Had a great diner with friends and family. Steak is always on points and the service was fantastic. Perhaps they can have a better selection of cocktails being that we’re in Toronto and it calls for it. Otherwise great place.

title: Option Plus
text: When flying with family I highly recommend this airline. They’ve always taken care of us when flying to Europe. I’ve been taking this airline for the last 4 years. When flying take the Option Plus with tour ticket. It includes priority boarding and baggage, complimentary drinks on board and free seat selection.

title: Visit history
text: When in Athens drive about an hour away and you’ll be in Paradice. Great place to take in some history and have a dip in the blue waters. Great little restaurants on the beach to have a lunch or dinner.

title: Fantastic Views
text: Must do when in London. The views are fantastic and breathtaking. Lots of family fun and a way to see London in its entirety

title: Fantastic Spot
text: Great ambiance and beautiful crowd. Just what I expected while visiting Glyfada. Great apps and drinks.

title: Excellent Choice
text: Owners Chris and Soula are great people and the ambiance is fantastic. The food is delicious and a must try is the grilled calamari

title: Weekend get a way
text: Great place. Staff and location are great. We came from Toronto, Canada for a few days and enjoyed every minute. Location, rooms and staff went out of their way to make us feel at home. The vibe was great.
